The user creates a seal that can teleport anything within its confines to a predetermined location, dispersing into balls of light. Hamura used this technique to travel to the moon he and [[Hagoromo]] [[Six Paths — Chibaku Tensei|created]].

[[pl:Pieczęć Teleportacji]]
